name: Filmushi
description:
Utilizing the color films provided, the player must help guide a worm named "Filmushi" to the goal. Each film has its unique effect on the level, and each film can be moved as well as placed differently to create new effects, and potentially opening up new paths. Utilize your imagination and find a path to the goal that only you can conjure.

To play the Android version on an android phone an apk installer is required.

The PC version can be played by using the mouse to emulate touch.

Learn more about this and other games I made on my website: https://davidkzhu.com
